dict.string: Build your foundation to achieve the benefits of QOT by watching the “foundation” videos in the LEARN section.
Learn about the Performance Habituation strategy “Creating Self Image” in LEARN.
Write your personal To Be Vision by going to “My Why” in the ME section.
Learn the 55 QOT strategies to help you make your personal To Be Vision happen.
Add a sensor through the sidebar to learn more about your sleep and activity in the ME section.
Go to PREPARE and prepare for your next key event applying various event-specific performance preparation protocols.
Tap on the top right and link it to a calendar entry - you will see this checklist in the note section of your calendar event.
Tap on your QOT push notifications to stay you on track. You can review your message in the QOT Guide.
LEARN contains your QOT 55 strategies and your foundational QOT content.
ME holds your To Be Vision, your QOT partners, and provides you with unique data about yourself and others like you.
TRACK YOUR DATA AND CREATE YOUR WHY
PREPARE help you prepare for your most important events and add them to your personal calendar.
GUIDE helps you get ready for your day with your Daily Prep Minute, access your learn plan, and review your messages.
Use the help section, sidebar, and main navigation to explore QOT.
